episodes.title: CULTivating Beauty: The Link Between ELF Cosmetics and NXIVM
episodes.description: On this weeks episode, Alicia and Nicole dive into a new scandal area—cults! Rumors are swirling that there is a link between a cult recently in the news, NXIVM, and ELF Cosmetics. The girls dig into what the link is, who is behind it, and what this means for the cosmetic consumer!Also, an update on some fun Black Friday purchases!NEW: WE HAVE MERCH!
